entity_mappings.justification: Consolidated all requirements (Person, Organization) into single OOTB Person entity. Using OOTB entity to minimize customization and leverage standard MDM capabilities. Additional fields added as custom attributes only where OOTB fields cannot accommodate requirements and are justified by functional requirements.
